channel.title: PI need helping fixing pk points
channel.description:
Please can somebody help me fix Pk points.
The source is PI, And the points are ingame but when you kill somebody in the wildy you dont recive any pk points.
I have teamviewer and would love it if somebody can help me with this. Also will pay them over paypal.
Pm me if you would like to help.

item.title: PI need helping fixing pk points
item.dc:creator: @lukeashworth lukeashworth
item.description:
@lukeashworth wrote:

LOL i already no that, when you get a kill it sais loads of random ass stuff,
And in that it sais you did not recive pk points because you have killed this person twice.
But then sais
k 0 d 1

Its just propper weird.

Read full topic
item.source: PI need helping fixing pk points

item.title: PI need helping fixing pk points
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

i think u fix u this on source PlayerAssistant.java search c.pkPoints += 0; change 0 to 1 or how manny u want it to give

Read full topic
